parameters.name: DatasetName
parameters.description: The name of the dataset. You can obtain the name of the dataset from the response of the [CreateDataset](~~478160~~) operation.

parameters.name: ProjectName
parameters.description: The name of the project. You can obtain the name of the project from the response of the [CreateProject](~~478153~~) operation.

parameters.name: WithStatistics
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable real-time retrieval of file statistics. Default value: false.

*   If you set the value to true, FileCount and TotalFileSize in the response return true and valid values.
*   If you set the value to false, FileCount and TotalFileSize in the response return invalid values or 0.
